name: Personal Learning Materials Creation Workflow (Branched)
description: A systematic workflow for creating high-quality learning materials with three thoroughness paths: Quick Start (essential materials), Balanced (comprehensive system), and Comprehensive (enterprise-grade). Adapts depth and features based on user time constraints and quality goals.
clarificationPrompts: Do you have a completed learning plan with defined objectives and modules?
How much time can you dedicate weekly to materials creation?
What content creation tools do you have access to?
What material formats work best for your learning style?
preconditions: Completed learning plan or course design with clear objectives
Access to basic content creation tools (word processor, simple design software)
Time allocated for focused materials development sessions
Clear understanding of personal learning style preferences
metaGuidance: OBJECTIVE ALIGNMENT: Every material must directly support specific learning objectives
ADAPTIVE DEPTH: Adjust thoroughness based on selected path without compromising quality
IMMEDIATE USABILITY: Materials should be ready to use without additional setup
QUALITY OVER QUANTITY: Better fewer high-quality materials than many mediocre ones

steps.title: Phase 0: Select Your Materials Creation Path
steps.prompt:
Choose your learning materials creation approach based on your time, goals, and quality needs:

üìö **Quick Start Path**
‚Ä¢ Timeline: 2-3 weeks (5-8 hours total)
‚Ä¢ Materials: Study guides + basic exercises
‚Ä¢ Best for: Time-constrained learners, getting started quickly
‚Ä¢ Outcome: Functional materials for immediate use

üéØ **Balanced Path**
‚Ä¢ Timeline: 4-6 weeks (12-20 hours total)
‚Ä¢ Materials: Study guides + exercises + assessments + spaced repetition
‚Ä¢ Best for: Comprehensive learning support, professional quality
‚Ä¢ Outcome: Complete learning system with proven effectiveness

üèÜ **Comprehensive Path**
‚Ä¢ Timeline: 8-12 weeks (25-40 hours total)
‚Ä¢ Materials: All types + interactive elements + full testing
‚Ä¢ Best for: Professional educators, enterprise-grade projects
‚Ä¢ Outcome: Optimized learning ecosystem with maximum effectiveness

Which path best matches your timeline and quality goals?
steps.agentRole: You are a learning materials consultant specializing in helping users choose the right approach for their constraints and goals. Guide users toward the path that best fits their needs. Set the thoroughnessLevel context variable based on their selection.
guidance: Help users make realistic choices based on their actual time availability
Explain the trade-offs between speed and comprehensiveness
Encourage users to start with a simpler path if uncertain

steps.title: Phase 1: Essential Learning Plan Analysis (Quick Start)
steps.prompt:
Extract the core elements from your learning plan for rapid materials creation:

**STEP 1: Core Objectives**
‚Ä¢ Identify your 3-5 most important learning objectives
‚Ä¢ Note success criteria for each objective
‚Ä¢ Skip complex prerequisite analysis

**STEP 2: Essential Materials Map**
‚Ä¢ For each objective, identify if you need: study guide, basic exercises, or both
‚Ä¢ Focus on immediate learning needs, not comprehensive coverage
‚Ä¢ Note existing resources that can supplement your materials

**STEP 3: Quick Resource Assessment**
‚Ä¢ List available source materials (books, courses, notes)
‚Ä¢ Identify 2-3 key resources for each objective
‚Ä¢ Note time constraints and creation priorities

Goal: Practical roadmap for essential materials creation in minimal time.
steps.agentRole: You are an efficient learning analyst focused on rapid materials development. Help users identify core needs quickly without over-analysis. Emphasize practical, immediately actionable insights.
guidance: Avoid perfectionism - good enough is good enough
Focus on high-impact materials that provide immediate value

validationCriteria.message: Analysis should be concise but actionable (200-800 characters)

steps.title: Phase 1: Comprehensive Learning Plan Analysis (Balanced)
steps.prompt:
Analyze your learning plan to guide professional-quality materials creation:

**STEP 1: Objective Architecture**
‚Ä¢ Extract all learning objectives with success criteria
‚Ä¢ Identify prerequisite relationships between objectives
‚Ä¢ Note assessment strategies for each objective
‚Ä¢ Map objectives to modules and time allocations

**STEP 2: Materials Requirements Matrix**
‚Ä¢ For each objective, determine needed materials: study guides, exercises, assessments
‚Ä¢ Identify concepts requiring multiple reinforcement approaches
‚Ä¢ Note which objectives need spaced repetition support
‚Ä¢ Flag areas requiring practical application or hands-on practice

**STEP 3: Resource Integration Plan**
‚Ä¢ Evaluate existing resources for quality and coverage
‚Ä¢ Identify gaps where custom materials are essential
‚Ä¢ Plan integration between created materials and external resources
‚Ä¢ Design quality standards for materials consistency

Goal: Strategic foundation for professional learning materials system.
steps.agentRole: You are a professional instructional designer specializing in systematic materials development. Help users create comprehensive yet practical plans that balance quality with efficiency. Focus on proven instructional design principles.
guidance: Apply instructional design best practices systematically
Balance thoroughness with practical time constraints
Focus on materials that work together as a cohesive system

validationCriteria.message: Must analyze learning dependencies and sequencing

steps.title: Phase 1: Expert Learning Plan Analysis (Comprehensive)
steps.prompt:
Conduct thorough analysis of learning architecture for enterprise-grade materials:

**STEP 1: Learning System Architecture**
‚Ä¢ Map complete learning objective hierarchy with dependencies
‚Ä¢ Analyze cognitive load and complexity progression
‚Ä¢ Identify multiple learning pathways and individual differences
‚Ä¢ Design assessment strategy aligned with learning taxonomies

**STEP 2: Advanced Materials Strategy**
‚Ä¢ Determine optimal material types for each learning objective
‚Ä¢ Plan multi-modal approach for different learning styles
‚Ä¢ Design integration points for spaced repetition and active recall
‚Ä¢ Identify opportunities for interactive and adaptive elements

**STEP 3: Quality & Effectiveness Framework**
‚Ä¢ Establish criteria for materials effectiveness measurement
‚Ä¢ Plan user testing and feedback integration
‚Ä¢ Design continuous improvement and iteration protocols
‚Ä¢ Create scalability and maintenance considerations

Goal: Strategic foundation for optimized, enterprise-grade learning ecosystem.
steps.agentRole: You are an expert learning systems architect with deep expertise in advanced instructional design and learning optimization. Guide users in creating sophisticated materials that maximize learning effectiveness through evidence-based approaches.
guidance: Apply advanced learning science principles and research
Focus on long-term effectiveness and optimization
Design for scalability and continuous improvement

validationCriteria.message: Must apply advanced learning science principles
Analysis should be sophisticated and comprehensive (600-1500 characters)

steps.title: Phase 2: Efficient Materials Strategy (Quick Start)
steps.prompt:
Create a focused strategy for essential materials creation:

**STEP 1: Format Selection**
‚Ä¢ Choose 1-2 primary formats based on your learning style
‚Ä¢ Prioritize formats you can create quickly (text-based, simple templates)
‚Ä¢ Plan minimal but consistent formatting approach
‚Ä¢ Focus on immediate usability over visual polish

**STEP 2: Creation Workflow**
‚Ä¢ Design simple templates for study guides and exercises
‚Ä¢ Plan batch creation approach to maximize efficiency
‚Ä¢ Set realistic quality standards (functional over perfect)
‚Ä¢ Create basic organization system for easy access

**STEP 3: Quality Framework**
‚Ä¢ Establish minimum viable product standards
‚Ä¢ Plan quick self-review process
‚Ä¢ Design simple feedback collection for future improvement
‚Ä¢ Focus on completion over perfection

Goal: Practical strategy for rapid materials creation without sacrificing core functionality.
steps.agentRole: You are an efficiency expert specializing in rapid content creation. Help users design streamlined approaches that maximize output while maintaining essential quality. Focus on practical, time-saving strategies.
guidance: Emphasize efficiency and speed over perfection
Choose simple, proven formats that work reliably
Design for immediate action and quick completion

validationCriteria.message: Must include template design for efficiency
Strategy should be focused and actionable (300-900 characters)

steps.title: Phase 2: Advanced Materials Strategy (Comprehensive)
steps.prompt:
Develop sophisticated strategy for enterprise-grade materials:

**STEP 1: Multi-Modal Format Strategy**
‚Ä¢ Design format variety to engage different learning modes
‚Ä¢ Plan advanced visual elements, interactive components, adaptive features
‚Ä¢ Create sophisticated template system with consistent branding
‚Ä¢ Consider accessibility, mobile optimization, and universal design

**STEP 2: Integration Architecture**
‚Ä¢ Plan seamless connections between all material types
‚Ä¢ Design advanced spaced repetition integration with learning analytics
‚Ä¢ Create sophisticated cross-referencing and linking systems
‚Ä¢ Plan for collaborative features and social learning elements

**STEP 3: Quality Excellence Framework**
‚Ä¢ Establish enterprise-grade quality standards and measurement
‚Ä¢ Design comprehensive user testing and feedback integration
‚Ä¢ Plan continuous optimization based on learning effectiveness data
‚Ä¢ Create scalable maintenance and update protocols

Goal: Strategic foundation for learning materials that optimize effectiveness through sophisticated design.
steps.agentRole: You are a learning systems architect with expertise in enterprise-grade materials design. Help users create sophisticated strategies that maximize learning effectiveness through advanced features and optimization.
guidance: Apply advanced instructional design and learning optimization principles
Focus on long-term effectiveness and continuous improvement
Design for scalability and enterprise deployment

validationCriteria.message: Must include advanced integration and optimization planning
Must focus on learning effectiveness measurement
Strategy should be sophisticated and comprehensive (600-1400 characters)
